body_content.explanation: the activity of playing a musical instrument or singing on your own, or with only backing music:
examples: Jazz fans got a lot of soloing.
He did some brilliantfantastic soloing, in which his training as a classical musician was evident.

body_content.explanation: a type of rock climbing in which someone climbs alone, usually without any safety equipment:
examples: The most high-risk form of rock climbing is soloing.
He had a brush with death on a solo climbing expedition in Utah when a half-ton rock fell on him.
